name: FReD Lost In Space
description:
You awake to find yourself onboard a top secret government space station. 

Use your unusually bouncy body to find your way out!

  • Avoid Guards
  • Avoid Armed Guards
  • Avoid Advanced Incinerating Walls
  • Swap gravity
  • Bounce
  • Find the exit

Controls

  • A and D = Move
  • Spacebar = Restart Current Level
